app

Class MainApplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Panel
          • java.applet.Applet
            • javax.swing.JApplet
              • app.MainApplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer

    public class MainApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    The MainApplet class is responsible for rendering and displaying the game.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
